DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the potential of probiotics in prevention of respiratory tract infections and their complications in children
DOC.brief_title: Probiotics in Respiratory Tract Infections in Children
DOC.criteria: Age 312 yrs At least one episode of respiratory tract infection in the previous epidemiological season Direct telephone access available Informed consent signed Vaccination against the influenza Chronic adenotonsillar pathology Recurrent otitis Sinusitis Respiratory allergy Acute or chronic intestinal disease with diarrhea and/or malabsorption syndrome Lactose intolerance Functional or organic constipation Down syndrome Congenital or acquired heart disease Cerebral palsy Any chronic hepatic, renal, metabolic, or immune system disease
